name: Reminiscence (Crystal Nugent, ShaunGraham, Anne Mithi Hibble)
name_original: Reminiscence (Crystal Nugent, ShaunGraham, Anne Mithi Hibble)
description:
You play as a child living in a abusive household. Help the child recreate a new feeling of home in their cubby house off in the woods behind the house, the only place where they feel safe. Achieve this by taking certain items from the child's room and filling the cubby house with both the object itself and the memory attached. 

This game was created by.

Crystal Nugent: Game Design, Level design,Asset Creation/Animation. https://crystal-nugent.itch.io/

Shaun Graham: Game Design,Level Design, Visual effects.  https://shaungraham.itch.io/

Anne Mithi Hiddle: Programming, Animation https://windy-wolf-games.itch.io/

Kat Latcham: Animator, Asset Creation.  https://www.artstation.com/kat_latcham

Cooper :Animator, Asset Creation. 

Kai Chiu: Audio https://rickyjanitor64.wixsite.com/voltanofficial

Jackson: Audio

Kyle:Audio

Joshua Atkinson:Audio
